data.Name: Wilcox
data.Bio: wiLcox is currently pushing the limits of Hard Industrial, Mechanized Techno , and Hardcore in the United States music scene. He lives and breaths harsh electronic music. Born in the United Kingdom and moving to the states early in his life, Matt grew up as a drummer. At a young age he became fascinated by the distorted sounds of industrial rock and heavy beat driven music. At 16 years he started DJ'ing and soon became well known for his ability behind the decks. Read more on Last.fm
